document_name: Law on the electricity and gas supply (Energy Industry Act - EnWG)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DEU/2005/DEU-2005-01-01-Law on the electricity and gas supply (Energy Industry Act - EnWG)_be5eaa44c3ccfd0225f3fafb1c7cacb3.pdf
document_description: A framework policy to enhance competition, security of supply and sustainable energy production. It requires electricity labelling according to type of energy source, providing greater information on electricity sources to allow consumers to make informed decisions about suppliers.
